message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.NE 

This paper deals with reinforcement learning and function approximation, which are topics commonly studied in the subfield of machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper discusses the issue of catastrophic forgetting, which is a problem that arises in many types of learning algorithms and is often addressed using techniques from artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The pole balancing task mentioned in the abstract is a classic problem in robotics (cs.RO) and control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the use of pseudorehearsal is a technique commonly used in neural networks (cs.NE) to mitigate catastrophic forgetting, which suggests that this subfield may also be relevant to the paper.
